header: This 27.3-second nostalgic narrative was built to evoke warmth and connection. The edit relies on breathable pacing to navigate a library currently lacking high-energy payoff shots.
executive_summary: The library is currently suffering from a low-energy scarcity.
A vintage film LUT was applied to unify the visual tone.
Missing payoff shots prevented a traditional narrative climax.
Pacing was kept breathable and reflective to match the available footage.
Every clip was selected because no better alternative was available in the library.

advisor.hero: The library is starving for energy, turning what should be a punchy narrative into a quiet, low-key sequence.
advisor.body: We hit a hard bottleneck with missing payoff shots. Because the library is flagged with scarcity_low_energy, I couldn't build a climax, so I leaned into the nostalgic_narrative reference to make the low energy feel intentional rather than accidental.

friction_log: Start: High confidence in the nostalgic tone but immediately noticed the lack of energy.
Middle: Struggled to find playful clips that actually had movement, settling for what was there.
End: Finished with a breathable pace, though the lack of a payoff shot is obvious.

post_mortem.worked: The sync fidelity is nominal, and the breathable pacing matches the nostalgic intent. Segment 1 used clip_003.mp4 to establish the vibe effectively.
post_mortem.didnt: The edit lacks a climax because of the missing_payoff_shots bottleneck. Segment 4 used clip_013.mp4 which is peaceful but doesn't provide a strong finish.

next_steps: Upload high-energy payoff shots to provide a narrative climax.
Source footage that fits the 'lack' and 'the' motifs to fill structural gaps.
Expand the library with more active 'playful' clips to avoid low-energy filler.
clip_suggestions: Adding high-energy payoff shots would help resolve the current bottleneck.
The library is currently suffering from scarcity_low_energy, so adding more active footage is key.
Adding clips that fit the 'lack' motif would fill a specific gap I identified.
Adding clips that fit the 'the' motif would satisfy the requested narrative structure.
Including more variety in the 'playfulness' category would reduce reliance on filler.
technical: Applied lut_vintage_film to ensure the nostalgic narrative felt cohesive.
Maintained a breathable and reflective pacing style to compensate for the low-energy footage.
